input.sentences: she got all the ingredients together .
she had a few different colors .
the sugar came to a boil .
then she had to mix it all up .
output.sentences: Cindy had her ingrediants ready for her first cake.
She sprinkled all of the bright colors onto a sheet.
Cindy mixed the red food coloring on the stove.
She gently added the red mixture to her mixing bowl.
